001package imagingbook.spectral.dct;
002
003public class Dct2dFast extends Dct2dImp {
004        
005        private Dct2dFast(int width, int height) {
006                super(width, height);
007        }
008        
009        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
010        
011        /**
012         * Two-dimensional DCT implementation using {@code float} data. 
013         */
014        public static class Float extends Dct2dFast implements Dct2d.Float {
015                
016                /**
017                 * Constructor.
018                 * 
019                 * @param width width of the data array (dimension 0)
020                 * @param height height of the data array (dimension 1)
021                 */
022                public Float(int width, int height) {
023                        super(width, height);
024                }
025                
026                // -------------------
027
028                @Override
029                public Dct1d.Float get1dDct(int size) {
030                        return new Dct1dFast.Float(size);
031                }
032
033        }
034        
035        /**
036         * Two-dimensional DCT implementation using {@code double} data. 
037         */
038        public static class Double extends Dct2dFast implements Dct2d.Double {
039                
040                /**
041                 * Constructor.
042                 * 
043                 * @param width width of the data array (dimension 0)
044                 * @param height height of the data array (dimension 1)
045                 */
046                public Double(int width, int height) {
047                        super(width, height);
048                }
049                
050                // -------------------
051
052                @Override
053                public Dct1d.Double get1dDct(int size) {
054                        return new Dct1dFast.Double(size);
055                }
056
057        }
058
059}
